SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOLUTION WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO, B.CATEGORY_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, ENROLL_DATE, BC.CATEGORY_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY BC ON (B.CATEGORY_NO = BC.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SOLUTION_NO, SUBJECT, TAG, TITLE, SOLUTION_CONTENTS, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM SOLUTION WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON (BL.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND BL.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, TITLE, BC.CATEGORY_NAME, COUNT, ENROLL_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON (BL.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY BC ON (B.CATEGORY_NO = BC.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND BL.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOLUTION S JOIN SOLUTION_HEART SH ON (SH.USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHERE SH.SOLUTION_NO = S.SOLUTION_NO
SELECT S.SOLUTION_NO, S.SUBJECT, TITLE, S.COUNT, S.CREATE_DATE FROM SOLUTION S JOIN SOLUTION_HEART SH ON (SH.USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHERE SH.SOLUTION_NO = S.SOLUTION_NO
